> library(foreign)
> temp<-read.spss("2008data.sav")
> write.csv(temp,"data2008.csv",row.names=F)
> data2008<-read.csv("data2008.csv")
> mu<-colMeans(data2008[,2:9],na.rm=T);mu
       AT       ANT        BT       BNT        DT       DNT       L1T      L1NT 
0.5881833 0.2470740 0.8963076 0.2550341 1.5260984 1.2485653 1.0379088 0.5345617 
> new_data2008<-na.omit(data2008[,2:9])
> v=numeric(ncol(new_data2008))
> for (i in 1:ncol(new_data2008)) {
+   v[i]=var(new_data2008[i])
+ }
> var=v;var
[1] 1.0948959 0.3662630 2.0327787 0.2436261 3.1967333 8.8363860 3.3937014 0.3329044
> sd<-sqrt(var);sd
[1] 1.0463727 0.6051966 1.4257555 0.4935849 1.7879411 2.9726059 1.8422001 0.5769787
> cov<-cov(new_data2008);cov
